query.postlabel: Clarification from the Insured for Delay in Submission of Claims
Claim Form duly completed and signed by the insured on the prescribed format original
Medical Certificate Form (Prescribed one) completed and signed by the hospital authorities authenticated with Rubber Stamp
Detailed Discharge Summary from the Hospital on the Hospital Letter-head - Original authenticated with Rubber Stamp
Date-wise Treatment Summary for Dialysis (in the place of Discharge Summary)
Date-wise Treatment Summary for Chemotherapy/ Radiotherapy (in the place of Discharge Summary)
Death Summary (instead of Discharge Summary) in case the patient has passed away during hospitalisation - original
First Consultation Papers - Original
OPD Consultation Papers prior to Hospitalisation - Original
Admission Notes from the Hospital - certified copy
Treatment Chart from the Hospital - certified copy
Indoor Case Papers from the Hospital - certified copy
Hospital Main Inpatient Bill - original
Printed/ Serially Numbered Receipt for the amount paid against the Hospital Main Inpatient Bill - Original
Advance Receipt, paid if any - Original
Break-up bill for the Hospital Main Inpatient Bill - Original
Break up Bill for the Pharmacy/ Consumables / OT Materials
Detailed bill for the non-admissible amounts collected from the patient
Receipt for the amount collected from the patient
Pharmacy Bills in original for medicines purchased during hospitalisation
Prescriptions with Duration and Dosage for medicines purchased during hospitalisation
Investigation reports - in original for investigations done during hospitalisation
Histopathology report, if any, in original
Echo report
Angiogram (CAG) Report
USG report - pre operative
USG report - post operative
MRI Report
CT Scan Report
ECG Report
X-ray Plates/ Films
X-ray Reports
All Laboratory/ Investigation Reports
Report confirming Diagnosis
Blood Alcohol Report at the time of accident/ admission
Bill and Receipt for the Investigations conducted during hospitalisation
Certificate from treating Doctor on Any risk factors contributing to present ailment
Details of previous treatment taken
Certificate from treating Doctor on Relevance of past history to present problem in his/her expert opinion
Obstetric history / Gravida Status from the Hospital
Copy of Registration Certificate of Hospital Nursing Home issued by City Municipality/ Corporation
MLC report/ FIR for accident cases - certified copy
Detailed Clarification on the circumstances of the accident and the Injury/ First Aid obtained etc in case no Police
Certifiate from the hospital confirming Date and Time of Admission and Date and Time of Discharge
Certificate from the Treating Doctor on the Etiology/ Cause
Certificate from treating Doctor on Duration of the ailments
Certificate from treating Doctor on Duration/ History of Diabetes
Certificate from treating Doctor on Duration/ History of Hypertension
Certificate from treating Doctor on Duration/ History of Heart Disease
Certificate from treating Doctor on Duration/ History of Bronchial Asthma
Certificate from treating Doctor on Duration/ History of COPD
Certificate from treating Doctor on Duration/ History of Osteoarthritis
Certificate from treating Doctor on Duration/ History of Any other ailment/s
Certificate from treating Doctor on Any other significant past history given by patient
Certificate from the treating Doctor on the degree of refractive Error supported by the Report
Sticker for the implants used - original
Invoice for the implants used - Copy
PTCA Report
CABG Report
Confirmation from the hospital for non-utilisation of the cashless facility, if any sanctioned
Investigation reports - in original - for investigations done prior to admission
OPD Consultation Paper with details of presenting complaints/ Diagnosis
Kindly forward Bank Account details which includes Bank Name , Account No. , IBAN No. and SWIFT CODE
Referral letter from treating physician (not therapist)
Number of sessions required
Type of rehabilitation prescribed
Progress report from treating physician (not therapist) including percentage of improvement
Proof of Travel
Proof of relationship with the insured (for compassionate travel benefit)
Cephalometric X-ray copy
OPG (Panoramic X-ray) copy
Provide tooth number/s for which treatment was received
Breakdown description of the invoice (itemized)
Document in typed format (unclear handwriting)
Orthodontic claim form duly signed, dated & stamped by the treating orthodontist
Submit all original claim documents to AlKoot office
Date-wise treatment summary
Same services already approved in Pre-approval. Please coordinate with provider to cancel the pre-approval in order to process under Reimbusement
History and details of trauma
Photograph of purchased glasses
Exact treatment details
Other (please see remarks section)
